conversion_verification.notes: The conversion is a successful isometric 3D extrusions of the provided floor plan.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Strong volumetric representation. Walls show consistent height and thickness. Good isometric projection.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Excellent room layout fidelity. Nearly all walls align perfectly with the 2D source. Staircase/Entrance area is slightly simplified.

interior_elements.notes: Major items like the dining set, kitchen counter, and bed are present. Missing living room sofa and bathroom fixtures.

visual_clarity.notes: Structural clarity is high, but score is reduced due to garbled text/labels in the 3D render (E6).

detected_errors.description: Text labels from 2D plan are rendered as distorted/unreadable floating geometry in the 3D view.
Living room furniture grouping from 2D plan is missing in the 3D model.

summary: A highly accurate 3D transformation that maintains exact spatial relationships, though hindered by distorted text artifacts and some missing furniture.
